innerHTML.copy-this-url: Zkopírujte tuhle URL do OBS "Browser Source"
innerHTML.rooms-allow-for: Místnosti umožnůjí jednoduchý skupinový chat a pokročilou správu více streamů zároveň.
innerHTML.added-notes:
Poznámka:
  • Kdokoliv se může připojit, když zná jméno místnosti
  • Není doporučeno mít v místnosti víc než 4 lidi kvůli náročnosti na Váš počítač, ale za zkoušku nic nedáte.
  • iOS zařízení jsou omezena pouze na dva účastníky. Toto omezení je způsobeno Applem.
  • "Nahrávat" je nová a EXPERIMENTÁLNÍ funkce.
  • Musíte "Přidat" zdroj video do "Skupinová scéna" aby se tu zobrazil.
  • Tady je nové "vylepšený fullscreen" tlačítko přidané pro hostitele.
innerHTML.note-share-audio:
poznámka: Nezapomeňte zakliknout "Sdílet audio" v Chromu.
(Firefox nepodporuje sdílení zvuku.)
innerHTML.here-you-can-pre-generate: Zde můžete generovat linky do OBS i pozvánky na více použití.
innerHTML.enable-stereo-and-pro: Povolit Stereo a Pro HD Audio
innerHTML.info-blob:
Co je OBS.Ninja


  • 100% zdarma; bez stahování; žádné osobní data; bez přihlašování
  • Sdílejte video ze smartphonu, laptopu, počítače či svých kamarádů přímo do OBSka
  • Používáme nejmodernější Peer-to-Peer forwarding technologii, která zaručuje bezpečnost a minimální lag

  • Youtube video Demo
innerHTML.click-for-quick-room-overview: ❔ Klidni zde pro krátký přehled o funkcích
innerHTML.welcome-to-control-room:
Welcome. This is the control-room for the group-chat. There are different things you can use this room for:

  • You can host a group chat with friends using a room. Share the blue link to invite guests who will join the chat automatically.
  • A group room can handle around 4 to 30 guests, depending on numerous factors, including CPU and available bandwidth of all guests in the room.
  • Solo-views of each video are offered under videos as they load. These can be used within an OBS Browser Source.
  • You can use the auto-mixing Group Scene, the green link, to auto arrange multiple videos for you in OBS.
  • You can use this control room to record isolated video or audio streams, but it is an experimental feature still.
  • Videos in the Director's room will be of low quality on purpose; to save bandwidth/CPU
  • Guest's in the room will see each other's videos at a very limited quality to conserve bandwidth/CPU.
  • OBS will see a guest's video in high-quality; the default video bitrate is 2500kbps.

    • As guests join, their videos will appear below. You can bring their video streams into OBS as solo-scenes or you can add them to the Group Scene.
    The Group Scene auto-mixes videos that have been added to the group scene. Please note that the Auto-Mixer requires guests be manually added to it for them to appear in it; they are not added automatically.

    Apple mobile devices, such as iPhones and iPads, do not fully support Video Group Chat. This is a hardware constraint.

    For advanced options and parameters, see the Wiki.
innerHTML.more-than-four-can-join: Tyto čtyři sloty pro hosty slouží pouze k předvedení. K místnosti se mohou skutečně připojit více než čtyři hosté.
innerHTML.welcome-to-obs-ninja-chat: Vítejte na OBS.Ninja! můžete ihned poslat zprávy ostatním členům této místnosti
innerHTML.names-and-labels-coming-soon: Jména členů bude jedna z budoucích funkcí OBS.ninja.

Safari is more prone to having audio issues

miscellaneous.new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.submit-error-report: Press OK to submit any error logs to VDO.Ninja. Error logs may contain private information.
miscellaneous.director-redirect-1: The director wishes to redirect you to the URL:
miscellaneous.audio-processing-disabled: Audio processing is disabled with this guest. Can't mute or change volume
miscellaneous.not-the-director: <font color='red'>You are not the director of this room.  You will have limited to no control.  You can try claiming the room after the first director leaves.</font>
miscellaneous.room-is-claimed:
The room is already claimed by someone else.

Only the first person to join a room is the assigned director.

Refresh after the first director leaves to claim.
miscellaneous.streamid-already-published:
The stream ID you are publishing to is already in use.

Please try with a different invite link or refresh to retry again.

You will now be disconnected.
miscellaneous.room-test-not-good:
The room name 'test' is very commonly used and may not be secure.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?
miscellaneous.load-previous-session: Would you like to load your previous session's settings?
miscellaneous.enter-password:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive and you will not be alerted if it is incorrect.)
miscellaneous.enter-password-2:
Please enter the password below: 

(Note: Passwords are case-sensitive.)
miscellaneous.password-incorrect:
The password was incorrect.

Refresh and try again.
miscellaneous.enter-new-display-name: Enter a new Display Name for this stream
miscellaneous.what-bitrate: What bitrate would you like to record at? (kbps)
miscellaneous.enter-website: Enter a website URL to share
miscellaneous.press-ok-to-record:
Press OK to start recording. Press again to stop and download.

Warning: Keep this browser tab active to continue recording.

You can change the default video bitrate if desired below (kbps)
miscellaneous.no-streamID-provided:
No streamID was provided; one will be generated randomily.

Stream ID:

Info: Only AlphaNumeric characters should be used for the stream ID.

The offending characters have been replaced by an underscore

The Stream ID should be less than 45 alPhaNuMeric characters long.

We will trim it to length.
